1: My mommy made me mash my M&M's.
2: Hello, my friend, you are an absolute disaster and I know it.
3: Can you tell me how to get to Sesame Street?
4: She couldn't decide of the glass was half empty or half full so she drank it.
5: Peter found road kill an excellent way to save money on dinner.
6: It was always dangerous to drive with him since he always insisted the safety cones were a slalom course.
7: When she didn't like the guy who was trying to pick her up, she started using sign language.
8: Improve your goldfish's physical fitness by getting him a bicycle.
9: Mothers spend months of their lives waiting on their children.
10: There aren't enough towels in the world to stop the sewage flowing from his mouth.
